properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 6:45PM CST until February 20 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Tombigbee River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* from Wednesday February 19 until Thursday February 20.
* At 5 PM Monday the stage was...13.1 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 14.9 feet on Wednesday February 19.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Wednesday February 19 and
continue to rise to near 14.9 feet by Wednesday February 19. The
river will fall below flood stage by Thursday February 20.
* At 14.0 feet...Flooding of low-lying agricltural land is occurring.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
